p:
Experiments with A/H1N1 and A/H3N2 viruses were performed under biosafety level 3 conditions and experiments with A/H5N1 were performed under biosafety level 3+ conditions. Experiments with A/H5N1 AT were conducted in adherence with the conditions of the U.S. Government Gain-of-Function Deliberative Process and Research Funding Pause of Selected Gain-of-Function Research involving Influenza, MERS and SARS viruses
52 .
